title: The Daily Message: Through the Bible in One Year
description: Spend just ten minutes a day reading The Daily Message and watch God's Word come alive in your life. It's an innovative approach to reading God's story cover to cover, one day at a time, in the life-changing, everyday language of The Message. Features include: The Book-at-a-Time reading plan breaks your Bible reading into manageable portions. The format of just six readings per week provides flexibility and makes it easy to catch up on missed days. Each Bible reading includes an inspirational word from Psalms or Proverbs and concludes with contemplative questions to stimulate further interaction with Scripture. Bound-in ribbon marker helps you keep your place. The small-group reading guide makes The Daily Message a great companion for Bible studies and groups.
author: Eugene H. Peterson
